name: I Command Thee
description:
Controls

Receive a mail -> Give to employee -> Stamp -> Send -> Done

Mouse Drag & Drop. Right click on a mail to see its content.

Avoid getting too many mails waiting around, or you'll get overwhelmed with them !

__

Description

I Command Thee is a satirical game, in which you take the role of a manager, that has one single purpose : avoid working at all costs !

To achieve this, you'll have to make sure you delegate tasks to your slaves interns, stamp them and quickly send them back to your clients. You also must get rid of all those pesky junk mails to avoid getting overwhelmed by them !

__

This game was made for the 2020 VimJam Game Jam, and had to comply with two themes :

  • There and back : This theme is taken quite literally by the emails, that have to go there and back, between you, the ones to actually do the tasks, you again, and the clients !
  • Collectables : Is this game, you collect emails, which you absolutely do not want ! If you collect too many of them, this means game over. Experience being afraid of watching that collectable meter going higher and higher, completely out of your control !
